creator: matteg@saanich.ca
text:
Description: This program reads an Excel 2003 spreadsheet that references another spreadsheet from cell K12 of sheet Account Number Master. This example illustrates two errors in the Jakarta POI 2.5.1 package:

  1. The HSSFCell.getCellFormula() returns the name of this cell's sheet not the external workbook and sheet name of the referenced cell in the external workbook. No workaround is available.
  2. The HHSFRow.getPhysicalNumberOfCells() is too small by one when a cell referencing another workbook is in the row. The workaround is to not rely on the method and instead iterate over all 256 cells (0-255) ignoring nulls.
In an Excel 2003 workbook IT2005short.xls at sheet Account Number Master at cell K12 is the formula
=+'C:\d\myPrograms\jbproject\POI1\[GM Budget.xls]8085.4450'!$B$2
but the formula returned by HSSFCell.getFormulaString() is
+Account Number Master!$B$2.

Created attachment 13037
spreadsheet referring to another sheet

text: Note: The original bugzilla report # 31661 reported that a second error existed - * HSSFRow.getPhysicalNumberOfCells() was reported to be one too small. * Such is not the case as proven by this test program.
creator: matteg@saanich.ca

text:
The reported problem is not reproducible with the latest trunk.
Please try the latest 3.5-beta4 or download daily builds from http://encore.torchbox.com/poi-svn-build/

Yegor
creator: yegor@dinom.ru
